text: Aur woh kaun hai jo khushki aur samandar ki tareekiyon (darkness) mein tumko raasta dikhata hai aur kaun apni rehmat ke aagey hawaon ko khush khabri lekar bhejhta hai? Kya Allah ke saath koi dusra khuda bhi (yeh kaam karta) hai? Bahut baala o bartar hai Allah us shirk se jo yeh log karte hain
